# [Interview #1030: WorldCon Flash AMA, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1030#9)

#### [lomeonÂ (August 2013)](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1lhf1e/worldcon_flash_ama_brandon_sanderson/cbzacgm)

Has Midius found his way to Taldain at some point? If so, will we be able to see him there?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Taldain has seen visits from non-natives.
